name: Super Cardumen - GGJ 2019
description:
You're a small fish that has been left behind his fish bank. If you don't want to perish in solitude, you must be reunited  with them. Careful! Humans leftovers may make your path difficult.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2019. It was done in 2 days. Check the ggj site for more data: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/super-cardumen
